bout 3 years.=C2=A0 When did you join?

--- On Tue, 11/2=
/10, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:


From: Frank Sumpti=
on <purplealiengirl@...>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] For the "pure EVP" enthus=
iast
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, RTSC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesday, Novem=
ber 2, 2010, 8:30 AM


=C2=A0 


=C2=A0Such as those that think real EVP ca=
n only be received using white noise might want to do some real research st=
arting with natural radio and what are call spherics and whistlers, or puls=
es generated by lightening and other "natural" EMF sources. Some,=C2=A0 wil=
l no doubt claim=C2=A0their system operates at such a high frequency that i=
t can not get the low frequency EMFs of natural radio--wrong again. This st=
uff covers the whole the spectrum from DC to light, and those little whispe=
rs are=C2=A0mostly just RF noise from natural and man made sources, you can=
 even get=C2=A0the noise from big planets, here on Earth, from Jupiter and =
Saturn.=C2=A0 Get a sound=C2=A0 that might seem like singing and I am prett=
y sure it's just what is called a "whistler", probably from terrestrial lig=
htening. The thunderstorm can be anywhere, this stuff propagates just like =
radio, and there are hundreds of thunderstorms all over the planet at any g=
iven moment.=C2=A0
 Everytime an electric motor starts, or a florescent lig=
ht, or a car starts, anything that uses electricity, there is going to be a=
 magnetic field radiated.=C2=A0 How many electric lights are in the world g=
oing on and off!?=C2=A0 How about in a factory, large shop, lab, or manufac=
turing/research facility?Lots and lots of magnetic/electric pulses.
=C2=A0
=
=C2=A0Then, to make it worse, people claim be touched during investigations=
 might want to investigate static electricity!=C2=A0 Clothes generate elect=
ric fields as we move around, normally it goes unnoticed, but=C2=A0moving a=
round=C2=A0in the dark listening and feeling for anything, you might think =
you're being touched, or your clothes moved. Could it be just the static el=
ectricity causing attraction and/or repulsion of areas of clothing?=C2=A0 I=
'm not saying that's what it is. Just be sure, and to get the pure=C2=A0exp=
erience, I think all ghost investigations should be done naked to eliminate=
 all static electricity from clothing. :-O 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0I know, sounds lik=
e debunking, but ya have to stop and think sometimes.=C2=A0 Some of these e=
ffects we feel and hear can be caused by natural magnetic and electric sour=
ces. Then, make it worse cuz we can create, via thought forms, just what we=
 want to experience. One must control one's emotions! 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0There a=
re=C2=A0some that have established themselves as experts based on white noi=
se EVP. To maintain position they may claim only white noise EVP is accepta=
ble and pure.=C2=A0 What is white noise? A frikkin' raw audio in it's simpl=
est form, so why not use higher level sounds and get higher level voices? W=
hen you get voices giving names, answering questions, and even cussing and =
swearing, I am pretty sure "the box" as it's come to be=C2=A0known beats th=
e be-geeesies out of white noise BS. Yes, you can get broadcast fragments, =
and bits that can be mistaken, but with white noise, you can get all kinds =
of weak noise pulses that probably say nothing, but you are desperately try=
ing to interpret. It's been my experience that the more one filters and cle=
ans a recording, the more these noises sound intelligible. If you have to f=
ilter it just to hear if it is saying anything--forget about it!=C2=A0 I th=
ink our own minds and psi ability--can---
 influence the sounds and create =
a meaning where there was none. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Spirit exists in a higher dim=
ension, as such they have full access to our level and can easily manipulat=
e sound and everything else. We are limited, they are not. That's why I foc=
us on higher level, more energetic phenomenon and ignore stuff like white n=
oise EVP or orbs. Paranormal experience is more dictated by what one can ac=
cept than anything else,=C2=A0 by what one fears as well. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=
=C2=A0Wait=C2=A0for it! Wait for it! Here it comes-- the threats of law sui=
ts and how dare you question......
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Am I an expert--hell no, ex=
=3D=3D=3Dhas been, 'spert=3D=3Ddrip under pressure.=C2=A0I don't want to be=
 a "paranormal expert" 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0F-S

<div> Such as those that think re=
al EVP can only be received using white noise might want to do some real re=
search starting with natural radio and what are call spherics and whistlers=
, or pulses generated by lightening and other "natural" EMF sources. Some,&=
nbsp; will no doubt claim their system operates at such a high frequen=
cy that it can not get the low frequency EMFs of natural radio--wrong again=
. This stuff covers the whole the spectrum from DC to light, and those litt=
le whispers are mostly just RF noise from natural and man made sources=
, you can even get the noise from big planets, here on Earth, from Jup=
iter and Saturn.  Get a sound  that might seem like singing and I=
 am pretty sure it's just what is called a "whistler", probably from terres=
trial lightening. The thunderstorm can be anywhere, this stuff propagates j=
ust like radio, and there are hundreds of thunderstorms all over the planet=
 at any given moment. 
 Everytime an electric motor starts, or a flore=
scent light, or a car starts, anything that uses electricity, there is goin=
g to be a magnetic field radiated.  How many electric lights are in th=
e world going on and off!?  How about in a factory, large shop, lab, o=
r manufacturing/research facility?Lots and lots of magnetic/electric pulses=
.</div>
<div> </div>
<div> Then, to make it worse, people claim b=
e touched during investigations might want to investigate static electricit=
y!  Clothes generate electric fields as we move around, normally it go=
es unnoticed, but moving around in the dark listening and feeling=
 for anything, you might think you're being touched, or your clothes moved.=
 Could it be just the static electricity causing attraction and/or repulsio=
n of areas of clothing?  I'm not saying that's what <u>it is</u>. Just=
 be sure, and to get the pure experience, I think all ghost investigat=
ions should be done naked to eliminate all static electricity from clothing=
. :-O </div>
<div> </div>
<div> I know, sounds like debunking, bu=
t ya have to stop and think sometimes.  Some of these effects we feel =
and hear can be caused by natural magnetic and electric sources. Then, make=

ence. One must control one's emotions! </div>

<div> =

ments, and bits that can be mistaken, but with white noise, you can get all=
 kinds of weak noise pulses that probably say nothing, but you are desperat=
ely trying to interpret. It's been my experience that the more one filters =
and cleans a recording, the more these noises sound intelligible. If you ha=
ve to filter it just to hear if it is saying anything--forget about it!&nbs=
p; I think our own minds and psi ability--can---
 influence the sounds and =
create a meaning where there was none. </div>

Spirit exists in a higher dimension, as such they have full access to our l=

and ignore stuff like white noise EVP or orbs. Paranormal experience is mor=
